titles.title: Worthy is the Lamb that was slain,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain,
The Lion of the tribe of Judah;
He has won, He has overcome
For ever, Amen.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Our salvation is due to our God
Who is seated on the throne,
And to the Lamb. To Them
We owe our deliverance.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Out of great tribulation
Are these come and washed their robes
And made them clean and white
In the precious blood of the Lamb.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He Who sits on the throne will protect
And spread His dwelling,
Cover and shelter them
With His holy presence.
